name: 專題討論（四）
description: 本課程定期邀請國內外地球科學領域之學者專家進行專題演講，包含地質、地球物理、海洋、大氣與太空等次領域，介紹其近期研究內容與結果，並進行學術討論。
goals: 透過當代不同領域學者之講演使學生學習本系各相關學術領域的最新進展，並從而規劃相關研究題材。
syllabus:
\[16+2.  Flexible weeks plan: Self-Learning. Reading material provided by faculties, speakers and students\]

Week 1. Introduction

Week 2-16. Presentation to be given by invited speakers and graduate students on earth sciences-related topics.

Week 17&18. Self-Learning. Reading material provided by faculties, speakers and students

methodologies.note: The schedule of invited talk can be found on the website after school starts
